alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:51PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Idaho County through 145 PM PDT... At 1250 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Imnaha, or 31 miles east of Enterprise, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Bird, Cottonwood, Slate Creek, Copperville, Canfield and Lucile. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region; Southern Clearwater Mountains
